globals.title: Tease
globals.description: We are a full service hair salon located in the Ballard neighborhood of Seattle. We provide cuts for all ages and genders, full custom color services, texture options, smoothing treatments, make-up, facial waxing and custom styles for personal or group events.
globals.keywords: Seattle, Ballard, Washington, Nicka, Melissa, hair, salon, hair salon, color services, texture options, smoothing treatments, make-up, facial waxing, custom styles
